about_the_game:
Skyguard is a single player arcade flight combat game with stylized graphics and fast-paced gameplay. Switch between different squadrons, shred enemy in dogfight, engage groups of enemy with multi-lock weapons.
Your experience can be further customized with different unlockable planes, weaponry and game mode to your desire. Win a lasting battle that requires cooperation with different types of planes, progress through series of mission in campaign, or jump straight into combat in instant action mode.

Key feature:
- Fast-paced arcade air combat
- Command different squadrons and switch between pilots at any time.
- Choose your way of combat: Zoom in and shred enemy in dogfight mode or let the missiles fly, the choice’s all yours.
- Various plane and weaponry for your choice.
- Different single player game modes providing gameplay sessions of different length and experience.
- Easy to use mouse-flight and traditional flight control, switch at anytime.

name: Skyguard 0: Air arcade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium CPU 4415U 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 610
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
